thread.title: Angels pull off amazing comeback to beat Rangers, stay alive - Inland Valley Daily Bulletin
thread.title_full: Angels pull off amazing comeback to beat Rangers, stay alive - Inland Valley Daily Bulletin - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Inland Valley Daily Bulletin
title: Angels pull off amazing comeback to beat Rangers, stay alive - Inland Valley Daily Bulletin
text:
The Los Angeles Angels rallied for five runs in the ninth inning, taking their playoff hopes into the final day of the regular season with an 11-10 win over Texas on Saturday that again kept the Rangers from clinching the AL West title. Rangers closer Shawn Tolleson, pitching for the fifth straight day, entered with a 10-6 lead and allowed consecutive homers to Erick Aybar and Kole Calhoun.
 Inland Valley Daily Bulletin.
